title: useless bronze player need  all theses wise pro players help
body: hey guys plz  don't start by judging i know am bronze player n i i belong to bronze as well but am just here to get some help so dnt tell me how bad i do cheak my game on op.gg n my builds and tell me if you have any advise for me to get out of bronze am bronze 4 and wanna climp up , i used to think its not my fault its my team so bad but recently started to change my mind and started to look carefully what i do rong even that i win my lane like 80 percent of the time but i dn't go n help the other lanes not sure what else to do so please cheak my games n my builds and give me some good advices and ideas to get out of bronze and maybe roles or champions you recommend or maybe if i better change my roles and go for other roles easier to get out of bronze

replies.body:
Hi xmoro00x,
The great part is that you have accepted the fact that you are bad, and it isn't your team that is dragging you down. Congratulations, you may now begin the climb :D

Looked at your match history and you seem to be doing fine. Some bad games, but everyone has those sometimes. 

At a glance,[ your warding is pretty bad](http://wardscore.loltools.net/?name=xmoro00x&region=oce) and I would suggest working on that. Warding helps everyone on your team out by providing a warning of enemy engages, as well as general enemy movement. If everyone on your team is doing your part, you can usually pull out a win knowing that the enemy team isn't doing so flash with their vision.

Next I would suggest picking your two main roles. [You seem to like playing ADC and are relatively good at it](http://oce.soloq.gg/multi/search/453797/SEASON2016), so maybe pick ADC & TOP so you usually get your main role.
[ Here are some pretty good ADC tips from a high elo adc main written up a couple of days ago. ](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy/PBufxsR4-midlate-game-adc-help)
Spend some time looking at guides, reworking your runes and masteries, and maybe even sorting out some item sets. 

We have quite a few other tips and stories come out of the woodwork over on[ THIS](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy/iRdbOiRe-how-did-you-all-climb-out-of-b5) thread, take a look as some of it will be really helpful to you.

Good luck, may the elo be ever in your favour ♥
